links.*: The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition)

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|2980|2981|2982|2983|2984|2985|2986}}

* Birth of [[Faramir]], son of [[Ruling Steward|Steward]] [[Denethor II]] of [[Gondor]] and [[Finduilas (wife of Denethor)|Finduilas]].<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, p. 206</ref><ref>{{App|TA}}</ref>
* Birth of [[Ferdibrand Took]], son of [[Ferdinand Took]].<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>
* Birth of [[Mentha Brandybuck]], second child and first daughter of [[Marmadas Brandybuck]].<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>
* Birth of [[Marigold Gamgee]], sixth child and third daughter of [[Hamfast Gamgee]] and [[Bell Goodchild]].<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>
==Other versions of the legendarium==
The second edition of [[Appendix B]] to ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' had [[Samwise Gamgee]]'s birth this year, which contradicted other information. The [[The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition)|50th Anniversary Edition]] corrected it to {{TA|2980}}.
